mapper.select: SELECT eh.hope_id hopeId, eh.hope_type hopeType, eh.user_id userId, eh.prduct_rule prductRule, eh.reserved1 imgUrl, eh.hope_real_money/eh.hope_money hopeState, eh.hope_real_money/eh.hope_money scale, es.reserve4 productName, eh.reserved2 hopeName FROM ef_hope eh LEFT JOIN ef_site es ON (eh.product_id = es.site_id) WHERE eh.hope_type='1' AND eh.user_id=#{userId} AND eh.hope_state='1' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,NOW(),CONCAT(eh.begin_date,' ',eh.begin_time))>48 UNION SELECT eh.hope_id hopeId, eh.hope_type hopeType, eh.user_id userId, eh.prduct_rule prductRule, eh.reserved1 imgUrl, eh.hope_real_money/eh.hope_money hopeState, eh.hope_real_money/eh.hope_money scale, eg.name productName, eh.reserved2 hopeName FROM ef_hope eh LEFT JOIN es_goods eg ON (eh.product_id = eg.goods_id) WHERE eh.hope_type='2' AND eh.hope_state='1' AND eh.user_id=#{userId} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,NOW(),eh.create_time)<6
